description: Detects when a user disables the Windows Firewall via a Profile to help evade defense.
name: Windows Firewall Profile Disabled
query: (((powershell.command.value:*Set\-NetFirewallProfile\ * OR process.command_line.text:*Set\-NetFirewallProfile\ *) AND (powershell.command.value:*\ \-Enabled\ * OR process.command_line.text:*\ \-Enabled\ *) AND (powershell.command.value:*\ False* OR process.command_line.text:*\ False*)) AND (powershell.command.value:(*\ \-All\ * OR *Public* OR *Domain* OR *Private*) OR process.command_line.text:(*\ \-All\ * OR *Public* OR *Domain* OR *Private*)))
author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
